main event: Multiple observations of an unidentified round object in Cleveland, Ohio during June 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed at an estimated height of five hundred feet,The object appeared yellow and moved very rapidly before disappearing,The size of the object was comparable to a half dollar held at arm's length,The sighting lasted approximately 15-20 minutes,There is an indication that the object might have been a balloon launched from a research facility.
